Text:
I will start seeding this at midnight Pacific Time.
Turns out I had a bigger problem than a defective video card  . . . my mother board went bad on me, so I replaced it with a Gigabyte board and got a better processor and doubled my memory . . . that will teach that naughty board.

Anyway, I am back. 

Just wondering, is there a reason you guys are not rating these torrents? I am used to seeing stuff like 6/10 or V6 A10 . . . is that just not done with ISOs?

Oh yeah, let me know if you would like to see anything else on these descriptions, I am just adding the stuff I would want to see on there.

Well, I messed up something in the description . . . It should read:

115 minutes
Color 
1.85:1
Spoken Language: English 
Subtitles: None
How does a fellow earn those skull icons?

Loving the stuff you're uploading. Thanks a lot. I just wondered if I could make a few requests. House (1977), Bergman Island, Ali: Fear eats the soul.

I also wondered in terms of the DVDs that you own, what are they like? Are they all art or do you own exploitation for example?

Thanks

faccage

I have an eclectic collection of DVDs; I try to focus on important films in film history but branch out a lot.
Below is a list of exploitation films I have on DVD. I probably have several others but do not have them listed as such in my cataloging software.

"Bad Taste"
"Black Snake Moan"
"Blood Feast"
"Bloodsucking Freaks"
"Cannibal Ferox"
"Cheeky!"
"Color Me Blood Red"
"Death Proof"
"Death Race 2000"
"Eaten Alive: 1980"
"The Gore Gore Girls"
"The Gruesome Twosome"
"I Spit On Your Grave"
"Ilsa, She Wolf Of The SS"
"Ilsa, Harem Keeper Of The Oil Sheiks"
"The Last House On The Left"
"Planet Terror"
"S.S. Hell Camp"
"Something Weird"
"Thriller: A Cruel Picture"
"The Wizard Of Gore"
"Zombie"

Hmm OK thanks. I'd probably be more interested in art films then, but particularly Fassbinder released by Criterion, such as Ali: Fear Eats The Soul, World on a Wire or any of the BRD trilogy.

Thank you.
have emailed a few admins/moderators to request for a skull for u :) .. thanks for all ur hard work!
